“Is This The World’s Toughest Commute?a  
BBC
----------------------------------------------

Priest hikes almost 2 hours one-way, scaling 800 foot wall, to get to church.

If you’ve ever felt tested by your faith, WATCH this INCREDIBLEA story.

[Watch Now](https://www.youtube.com/embed/r1QXpmv-y2E?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&rel=0)
